translation: Make your way through the desert ruins.{#Name="説明文"}
source: Make your way through the desert ruins.{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the enemies blocking your way!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the enemies blocking your way!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Ogre!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Ogre!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Flame Cerberus!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Flame Cerberus!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: Lady Two is with us all!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Lady Two is with us all!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: It's all right! Everything will be all right!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: It's all right! Everything will be all right!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Lady Two is the one true creator! Even if the world ends, we will survive! {#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Lady Two is the one true creator! Even if the world ends, we will survive! {#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Indeed! Any world that resists Lady Two must be torn to shreds!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Indeed! Any world that resists Lady Two must be torn to shreds!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: N-No... NO! I don't want to die!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: N-No... NO! I don't want to die!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: You will not die, my child.{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: You will not die, my child.{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: You will be the foundation upon which Lady Two builds a better world!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: You will be the foundation upon which Lady Two builds a better world!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: No! Spare me! Lemme go! Pleeeease!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: No! Spare me! Lemme go! Pleeeease!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: That's it... Keeeeeep smiling... It's almost over now...{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: That's it... Keeeeeep smiling... It's almost over now...{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: There she is! The putrid demon they call Zero!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: There she is! The putrid demon they call Zero!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: We offer ourselves to Lady Two!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: We offer ourselves to Lady Two!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: The offering must be made!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: The offering must be made!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Soon, very soon, all on this world shall be judged!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Soon, very soon, all on this world shall be judged!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: What can I do for Lady Two?{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: What can I do for Lady Two?{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: What should I be doing!? Somebody! Please, tell me!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: What should I be doing!? Somebody! Please, tell me!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: All hail Lady Two! All hail Lady Twoooo!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: All hail Lady Two! All hail Lady Twoooo!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Hail our Lady! Hail our Lady!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Hail our Lady! Hail our Lady!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: The day of judgment is nigh! We shall rise and attain a higher dimension!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: The day of judgment is nigh! We shall rise and attain a higher dimension!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Lady Two is the holy trinity! Mother, wife, and daughter of mankind!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Lady Two is the holy trinity! Mother, wife, and daughter of mankind!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Pluck the rotten flower from the face of the false Intoner!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Pluck the rotten flower from the face of the false Intoner!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: That blossom is an affront to Lady Two!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: That blossom is an affront to Lady Two!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: We have drunk from the cup of holy water! We are invincible!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: We have drunk from the cup of holy water! We are invincible!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Yeahhh!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Yeahhh!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Lady Two's holy water is within us!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Lady Two's holy water is within us!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Lady Two is a spring of righteousness! Her divinity can conjure miracles!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Lady Two is a spring of righteousness! Her divinity can conjure miracles!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Your faith is lacking! Your blasphemy will be punished!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Your faith is lacking! Your blasphemy will be punished!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Yes! Faith is all that matters in this world!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Yes! Faith is all that matters in this world!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Bow before Lady Two! Beg her righteous forgiveness!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Bow before Lady Two! Beg her righteous forgiveness!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: This world is beyond help! None of us can save it now.{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: This world is beyond help! None of us can save it now.{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Oh, God, I'm so dead... They're gonna kill me!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Oh, God, I'm so dead... They're gonna kill me!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Believe in Lady Two and she will resurrect you in the bounty of the afterlife!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Believe in Lady Two and she will resurrect you in the bounty of the afterlife!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: I believe in Lady Two, I swear it! I believe, I belieeeeve!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: I believe in Lady Two, I swear it! I believe, I belieeeeve!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Those who have yet to awaken are always quick to wail and scream. How pathetic!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Those who have yet to awaken are always quick to wail and scream. How pathetic!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: The true world is bathed in the innocent beauty of Lady Two!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: The true world is bathed in the innocent beauty of Lady Two!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: If Two and One are both in the city,{LF}that'll save me some killin' time.{#Name="Zero"}
source: If Two and One are both in the city,{LF}that'll save me some killin' time.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Let me... Let me help you out, too.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Let me... Let me help you out, too.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Sure. Fly up and scout ahead, okay?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Sure. Fly up and scout ahead, okay?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: S-Sure, Zero! You got it!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: S-Sure, Zero! You got it!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Aw, look at you trying to keep him safe.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Aw, look at you trying to keep him safe.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: You're just a big ol' cupcake, Z. You know that?{#Name="Dito"}
source: You're just a big ol' cupcake, Z. You know that?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: If Two and One are both in the city,{LF}that'll save me some killin' time.{#Name="Zero"}
source: If Two and One are both in the city,{LF}that'll save me some killin' time.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: The miracle is still alive! Believe in Lady Two!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: The miracle is still alive! Believe in Lady Two!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: If only Zero would bow to Lady Two's divine wisdom!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: If only Zero would bow to Lady Two's divine wisdom!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Lady Two is indestructible! Invincible! Immortal!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Lady Two is indestructible! Invincible! Immortal!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Fire! Fiiiiiire!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Fire! Fiiiiiire!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: They're moving too fast!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: They're moving too fast!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Where's your faith in Lady Two!?{LF}She will protect us!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Where's your faith in Lady Two!?{LF}She will protect us!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: I'm the 1597th man in line to{LF}receive Lady Two's salvation!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: I'm the 1597th man in line to{LF}receive Lady Two's salvation!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Who are these guys?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Who are these guys?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Such fanaticism resembles the withdrawal{LF}symptoms of certain medications.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Such fanaticism resembles the withdrawal{LF}symptoms of certain medications.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: What, so they're addicts?{LF}What are they addicted to?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What, so they're addicts?{LF}What are they addicted to?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Her song, I'd imagine.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Her song, I'd imagine.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Hey, Cent actually made sense!{LF}Give him a hand, everyone!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Hey, Cent actually made sense!{LF}Give him a hand, everyone!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: With Lady Two gone, the power{LF}of her song also vanishes.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: With Lady Two gone, the power{LF}of her song also vanishes.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Thus leading to the sad state{LF}of affairs before us.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Thus leading to the sad state{LF}of affairs before us.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Stupid dog. I'm gonna rip you apart!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Stupid dog. I'm gonna rip you apart!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Goddammit! Not another one!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Goddammit! Not another one!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I fear our enemies have picked{LF}up on Lady Zero's weakness.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I fear our enemies have picked{LF}up on Lady Zero's weakness.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Weakness?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Weakness?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Your dislike of performing the same{LF}task over and over and over again.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Your dislike of performing the same{LF}task over and over and over again.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Who asked you, you freaky gimp!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Who asked you, you freaky gimp!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Did you call me, Zero? Oh boy, oh boy, oh boy!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Did you call me, Zero? Oh boy, oh boy, oh boy!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Don't look so happy. Just do what{LF}you're here to do already. ...And{LF}when you're done, get some rest.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Don't look so happy. Just do what{LF}you're here to do already. ...And{LF}when you're done, get some rest.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Thanks, Zero! I'll try double hard, okay?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Thanks, Zero! I'll try double hard, okay?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Can we get to the Cathedral City{LF}from this path up ahead?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Can we get to the Cathedral City{LF}from this path up ahead?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Hmm...{#Name="Accord"}
source: Hmm...{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Dragons devolving...{LF}Disciples abandoning their Intoners...{#Name="Accord"}
source: Dragons devolving...{LF}Disciples abandoning their Intoners...{#Name="Accord"}

translation: A branch this strange merits very careful study.{#Name="Accord"}
source: A branch this strange merits very careful study.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Rather a lot of undead around here...{#Name="Octa"}
source: Rather a lot of undead around here...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: They're likely recycling the{LF}bodies of fallen soldiers.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: They're likely recycling the{LF}bodies of fallen soldiers.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Perhaps this is yet another symptom{LF}of Lady Two's absence.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Perhaps this is yet another symptom{LF}of Lady Two's absence.{#Name="Octa"}
